articles.description: Delta has a very poor balance sheet with high bankruptcy risk, giving it virtually no room for black-swan events such as the Ukraine war. I am bearish on DAL.
articles.content:
Chalabala/iStock via Getty Images
Over recent years, the COVID crisis created a highly tumultuous situation for many companies and industries. Some, such as airlines, took a much larger hit than oth… [+8856 chars]
